attributes.action: Hold an inquiry on potential Russian interference in the EU referendum
attributes.additional_details:
It is vital that we should carry out the recommendations of the Russia report in order to understand and combat any potential threat to our democracy from hostile states

https://isc.independent.gov.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/20200721_HC632_CCS001_CCS1019402408-001_ISC_Russia_Report_Web_Accessible.pdf
attributes.background: Carry out the recommendations of the Intelligence and Security Committee (ISC) Russia report. This should include an inquiry into potential Russian interference in the EU referendum.
